home.title: REBUILD

home.introduction: REBUILD provides you with business data management and analysis, permissions and flows, data auditing, message notification and other powerful functions, and can easily design a more suitable business system according to the different needs of enterprises.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.desc: The source code of REBUILD is completely open, you can modify it within the license

selfdesign.desc: You can design your own business system according to the needs of enterprise processes
